format: A data frame with 84 observations on the following 3 variables.
title: Rabbits Foetuses Survival Experiment
description:
Description
Experimental data for analyzing the effect of an increasing dose of a compound on the proportion of live foetuses 
affected. Four treatment-groups were considered: control “C”, low dose “L”, medium dose “M” 
and high dose “H”. The animal species used in the experiment was banded Dutch rabbit (Paul, 1982, Table 1).

parameters.y: a numeric vector: the number of affected foetuses.
parameters.n: a numeric vector: the total number of foetuses.
parameters.group: a factor with levels C, H, L and M
